about_the_game:
Kibbi Keeper VR is a unique experience where you get to meet and play with the Kibbi in virtual reality. Enjoy three mini-games that you can play with the Kibbi as well as a free-play encounter meadow!

Kibbi Keeper VR was developed by students at SMU Guildhall as an experimental, stand-alone extension of Kibbi Keeper. At this time, only Oculus headsets are officially supported.

Features:
  • Beautiful and relaxing meadow
  • Adorable and controllable companions
  • 3 different types of Kibbi!
  • 3 different mini-games: Snowball Fight, Fireball Dodgeball, and Musical Memory

Kibbi Keeper VR is a unique experience where you get to meet and play with the Kibbi in virtual reality. Enjoy three mini-games that you can play with the Kibbi as well as a free-play encounter meadow!

Kibbi Keeper VR was developed by students at SMU Guildhall as an experimental, stand-alone extension of Kibbi Keeper. At this time, only Oculus headsets are officially supported.

Features:
  • Beautiful and relaxing meadow
  • Adorable and controllable companions
  • 3 different types of Kibbi!

name: Kibbi Keeper VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-5930K or AMD 3600X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or better; 4GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum average sustained frame rate of 90fps or better achieved on hardware combinations in this min-spec range. Your experience may vary based on a variety of factors.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-5930K or AMD 3600X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or better; 4GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game runs well on most common gaming configurations within the past 5-6 years (GTX 980-era and beyond).

short_description: Kibbi Keeper VR is a unique, stand-alone, virtual reality experience where you get to meet and play with adorable creatures called Kibbi!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
